titleStmt.title: Coll. Henry Marten's familiar letters to his lady of delight Also her kind returnes. With his rival R. Pettingalls heroicall epistles. Published by Edm: Gayton, according to the original papers under their own hands: with an answer to that letter, intituled, A copy of H. Marten's letter in justification of the murther of the late King Charles.
titleStmt.author: Marten, Henry, 1602-1680.
Pettingall, Richard.
Ward, Mary, 17th cent.
Gayton, Edmund, 1606-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed [by A. Lichfield] for Richard Davis,

notesStmt.note: His lady of delight = Mary Ward.
Dedications signed: De Speciosâ Villâ, i.e. Edmund Gayton. Cf. Madan, III, 2602.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
